questions.author: Beth-3417
questions.title: How do I delete a Git branch both locally and remotely?
questions.detail: I want to delete a branch both locally and on my remote project fork on GitHub and I keep getting this error when I try to delete: error: branch 'origin/bugfix' not found.

questions.author: Alexia
questions.title: How to redirect to another webpage in JavaScript/jQuery?
questions.detail: I keep seeing both window.location = url; and window.location.href = url; How are they different? Are they?

answers.response: To delete the local branch use: $ git branch -d branch_name; and As of Git v1.7.0, you can delete a remote branch using this: $ git push origin --delete <branch_name>
jQuery is not necessary, and window.location.replace(...) will best simulate an HTTP redirect.
